meanings.definition: A fact or piece of information upon which an argument or theory is based.
meanings.sent1: The scientist presented a crucial donnee to support her hypothesis.
meanings.sent2: The police gathered all the donnees before making a conclusion.
meanings.sent3: The donnée about the missing cookie jar led to a hilarious misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the donnee that brightened up his day.
meanings.sent5: The donnée of the treasure map was etched in his memory.

meanings.sent1: The donnée of his argument was that honesty is always the best policy.
meanings.sent2: She built her entire theory on the donnée that hard work pays off.
meanings.sent3: The donnée that cats are better than dogs sparked a playful debate.
meanings.sent4: His donnée that laughter is contagious proved true during the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The donnée that the early bird catches the worm motivated him to wake up early.
